2. ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜! ìƒê°í•´ë³´ì

3. í•´ê²°ì½”ë“œ

[C++]

#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int solution(vector<vector<string>> clothes) {
    map<string,vector<string>> clothes_map;
    int answer = 1;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < clothes.size(); i++)
        clothes_map[clothes[i][1]].push_back(clothes[i][0]);
    
    for (auto it = clothes_map.begin(); it != clothes_map.end(); it++)
        answer *= (it->second).size() + 1;
    
    return answer - 1;
}


[Javascript]

1
2
3
4
5

11
12
13
14

function solution(clothes) {
    var map = new Array();
    var answer = 1;
    
    for (var i = 0; i < clothes.length; i++) {
        if (map[clothes[i][1]] >= 1) map[clothes[i][1]]++;
        else map[clothes[i][1]] = 1;
    }
    
    for (let m in map)
        answer *= (map[m] + 1);
    
    return answer - 1;
}
